metadata.name: Suspicious Execution of Systeminfo
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "systeminfo" command to retrieve information

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\systeminfo.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sysinfo.exe'))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "systeminfo" command to retrieve information
